name: iHUGU
description: Hug them all! Don’t forget about anyone :) We wanted to see people of different cultures, religions, political options, beliefs, races, skin colour, historical figures, fairy-tale characters, celebrities and all living beings ;) pass to each other the sign of peace – a hug. In one place, in one game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 1,4 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space
